channel.title: Using IP And Hamachi Instead of PF
channel.description: how can i use an ip and hamachi to allow people to come into my svr instead of port fowarding ?...plz tell me step by step if u do know... Thx

item.title: Using IP And Hamachi Instead of PF
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

ok dude…this is how you do it

Step 1:

Site URL: www.hamachi.cc/download/

Step 2:

scroll down and download it

Step 3:

Once it’s downloaded open it, and create a network and pass.

Step 4:

On the top or you hamachi screen there’s an IP, this is your server IP

Step 5:

Start you server (runserver) and connect using that IP

Step 6:

give your network name and pass out to people, when they connect they can use that IP you found in step 4 to connect.

Good luck!

Read full topic
item.source: Using IP And Hamachi Instead of PF
